verses.verse: For the Chief Musician; set to Jonath elem rehokim. A Psalm of David. Michtam; when the Philistines took him in Gath. Be <S%H2603>mercifu<s%> unto <S%H430>me<s%>, O God; For <S%H582>man<s%> would swallow me <S%H7602>up<s%>: All the <S%H3117>day<s%> long he <S%H3898>fighting<s%> oppresseth <S%H3905>me<s%>.
Mine <S%H8324>enemies<s%> would <S%H7602>swallow<s%> me up all the <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H4791>long<s%>; For they are <S%H7227>many<s%> that fight proudly against <S%H3898>me<s%>.
What <S%H3117>time<s%> I am <S%H3372>afraid<s%>, I will put my trust in <S%H982>thee<s%>.

In <S%H430>God<s%> (I will <S%H1984>praise<s%> his <S%H1697>word<s%>), In <S%H430>God<s%> have I put my <S%H982>trust<s%>, I will not be <S%H3372>afraid<s%>; What can <S%H1320>flesh<s%> do unto <S%H6213>me<s%>?
All the <S%H3117>day<s%> long they <S%H6087>wrest<s%> my <S%H1697>words<s%>: All their <S%H4284>thoughts<s%> are against me for <S%H7451>evil<s%>.
They gather themselves <S%H1481>together<s%>, they <S%H6845>hide<s%> <S%H8104>themselves<s%>, They mark my <S%H6119>steps<s%>, Even as they have <S%H6960>waited<s%> for my <S%H5315>soul<s%>.
Shall they <S%H6405>escape<s%> by <S%H205>iniquity<s%>? In <S%H639>anger<s%> cast <S%H3381>down<s%> the <S%H5971>peoples<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%>.
Thou <S%H5608>numberest<s%> my <S%H5112>wanderings<s%>: <S%H7760>Put<s%> thou my <S%H1832>tears<s%> into thy <S%H4997>bottle<s%>; Are they not in thy <S%H5612>book<s%>?
Then shall mine <S%H341>enemies<s%> <S%H7725>turn<s%> <S%H268>back<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I <S%H7121>call<s%>: This I <S%H3045>know<s%>, that God is for <S%H430>me<s%>.
In <S%H430>God<s%> (I will <S%H1984>praise<s%> his <S%H1697>word<s%>), In <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> (I will <S%H1984>praise<s%> his <S%H1697>word<s%>),
In <S%H430>God<s%> have I put my <S%H982>trust<s%>, I will not be <S%H3372>afraid<s%>; What can <S%H120>man<s%> do unto <S%H6213>me<s%>?
Thy <S%H5088>vows<s%> are upon <S%H430>me<s%>, O God: I will <S%H7999>render<s%> <S%H8426>thank-offerings<s%> unto thee.

For thou hast <S%H5337>delivered<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> from <S%H4194>death<s%>: Hast thou not delivered my <S%H7272>feet<s%> from <S%H1762>falling<s%>, That I may <S%H1980>walk<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> In the <S%H216>light<s%> of the <S%H2416>living<s%>?
